metadata.title: CVE-2018-1308 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: This vulnerability in Apache Solr 1.2 to 6.6.2 and 7.0.0 to 7.2.1 relatesto an XML external entity expansion (XXE) in the `&dataConfig=<inlinexml>`parameter of Solr's DataImportHandler. It can be used as XXE usingfile/ftp/http protocols in order to read arbitrary local files from theSolr server or the internal network.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
